items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you‚Äôre running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

items.content_html: Javascript/WebGL lightweight face tracking library designed for augmented reality webcam filters. Features : multiple faces detection, rotation, mouth opening. Various integration examples are provided (Three.js, Babylon.js, FaceSwap, Canvas2D, CSS3D...).

items.content_html: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
items.title: talentedaamer/javascript-confirm: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
